body.name: GRACE KARIN Women's Casual Linen Dresses 2024 Summer V Neck A Line Midi Dress with Pockets
features: Care instructions Machine Wash/ Hand Wash

COMFY MATERIAL: Crafted with high quality linen material, this womens summer dress drapes and flows, creating a mesmerizing silhouette that exudes elegance. Perfect for the summer season, the lightweight and breathable nature of this vacation midi dress grants you the utmost comfort.

WAIST DESIGN: The waistline is elegantly cinched and smocked, creating a flattering silhouette that accentuates the body curves. The womens flowy dress also comes with a stylish self-tie belt, allowing you to customize the fit and add a touch of personal flair.

FOUNCTIONAL POCKETS：on the sides of this women smocked dresses ensure that you can store your essentials without compromising on style, which make it easier when you are heading a wedding, graduation, anniversary, dance party, summer vacation, beach, holiday or casual outing.

EXQUISITE DETAILS: This womens casual dress features a stylish V-neckline and folded short sleeves, offering a truly sophisticated and elegant look. The V-neckline highlighting the collarbones and accentuating charm. The short sleeves are expertly fabricated to create a gentle fold at the hem, elevating the womens midi Dress's appeal.
SIZE SELLECTION: Please choose the right size according to the relevant parameters in the size chart provided by us, not according to your habit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What a pretty dress! I really like the material - it's thick and not at all see through. The fit is very much like the listing photos for me. The neckline is high enough you don't need an undershirt. It does look nursing friendly, but the cross part of the is sewn together, so unfortunately, it won't work for breastfeeding. The top is also probably best for a medium to large chested women. I'm smaller chested and it looks ok on me, but I think it would be more flattering on someone larger. The tie pictured on the back in the listings really could be worn either in the front or back - both look cute! The skirt is flowy but not unflattering and it is lined.. Best part - pockets!! I'm 5'3" and the hem hits me slightly lower than the listing photo - a true midi length for sure. Overall, I look forward to wearing this in the spring and summer months (but could also wear it in the fall with a sweater and some boots!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, but wrinkles easily
reviews.reviewText: I really like this dress and it's a very soft material. I honestly think the dress would be a bit more flattering on someone with a flatter chest, but it is still a graceful cut. I left mine in the dryer a bit too long, and the underskirt got wrinkled and bunched up, I had to hang the dress upside down from the underskirt to try and get it to unbunch, which worked pretty well. When I did wear the dress, I only had to adjust it occasionally, and I think if I had been faster to retrieve it from the dryer I could have avoided the issue entirely.I do think this is one of the materials that if you want it truly wrinkle-free, and you want the cuffs to look like they do on the model and the neckline to lay flat, you will have to iron it. Those cuffs and the neckline are subject to gravity, and without a hot press, they will fall however they'd like to after tumbling about in a dryer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m 5’5” and 145lbs and I ordered my usual size which is a medium and it fit well. I was impressed with the details, the skirt portion of the dress is lined to avoid showing more of your assets than you want. I love that it has nice sized pockets along each side. The waist is gathered elastic which gives you more of a defined waistline and there is a sash that you can tie in the front or back whichever you prefer. The orange red color is very pretty and I think would compliment any skin tone. The dress appears to be a linen blend so you may have to touch it up with an iron after washing. These pictures were taken after I washed it and hung it to dry, per the washing instructions. Overall the dress is very well made and is good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Meh. Wrong color, weird fit.
reviews.reviewText: The dress is salmon pink, not red-orange as described and pictured. These badly Photoshopped, color-swapped images have got to stop. The dress is lined on the bottom, which is great. The top is sheer, so be prepared to have undergarments that match your skin tone. The v-neck hits in a strange and unflattering place, and it's sewn so together so unnecessarily securely that there's no taking out the stitches to replace with a button or snap. Pockets add weird bulk at the hips. Waist is just high enough to draw attention to any extra belly fat. I have other dresses from this maker that I really like, but this one is a huge disappointment. Maybe for another body type, but not great for a tallish woman with swerves and curves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heavier fabric than expected
reviews.reviewText: Love this linen dress but it is layered and heavier fabric than expected. Will be great for Spring and Fall warmer weather but not HOT! Might be too heavy for Summer in warmer climates. I like that the V neck has stitching so that it is not a "deep V", but the stitch is a little high and falls at a weird place for my larger chest. Love that the connected band can either tie in the front or the back, and the length is a very nice tea-length.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning and Classy
reviews.reviewText: This dress is stunning on - it fits perfectly and is so classy in the best way! The linen is beautiful and I love the pockets. Feels well made and high quality so an absolute steal for the pricing. 10/10 would recommend and will probably buy in another color!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the color and fabric, but the neckline is awkward. It is supposed to look like a faux wrap dress, but the stitching is poor quality so the top does not fit well. It lays awkwardly and does not look nice. The skirt is pretty.
